p: As an alternate method to assess differences in virus maturation, we infected non-silencing and NUMA1 KD cells with PR8 at MOI = 3 and examined infected cells at 20 hpi by electron microscopy. Numerous small spherical structures, consistent with the ~100 nm IAV virion size, were clearly visible outside but near the cell membrane, presumably after budding ( Figure 5, middle, arrows) in N-Si infected cells. In contrast, production of these virus-sized particles was greatly reduced in infected NUMA1 KD cells ( Figure 5, right), in agreement with previous observations of reduced extracellular viral protein and infectious virus from these NUMA1 KD cells.
